original_title: An Evening With The Class That Saved Coach K
overview: The Class That Saved Coach K is a 90-minute documentary that tells the story of Duke Basketball head coach Mike Krzyzewski, and how his 1982 recruiting class overcame a bumpy start to change the narrative -- turning the Blue Devils around and setting its coach on an historic course.
tagline: Before he built the Duke dynasty, he had to build a team.
title: An Evening With The Class That Saved Coach K
